Posts.Content: Jan 5, 2008 06:20AM Dani37 wrote: Pip! Hello! I am 37 and was just diagnosed on 12-13-07 with IDC. I was kicked in my lower left breast in Feb. by my 3 yr. old nephew who was throwing a fit and a lump transpired. After mammograms, ultra sounds, MRI`s, and a core biopsy the results were in...  and I have gone through one surgery so far. I had a partial mast. with two lymph nodes removed. Results came back that one of the nodes has cancer and that I did not have clean margins. I am now awaiting the results to see if I have inherited the BRACA gene and have a scheduled bone scan and CT scan set up next week. I am freaking out and am shocked, angry, scared, frightened, and in a fog! Who knew a kick in the breast would result into all this. I am here for you whenever! We`ll get through this I promise!
Posts.Title: Cancer spreading to lymph nodes pippadoll Curlylocks

Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2008 06:32PM Dani37 wrote: First don`t look when you are receiving the needle.  Ask that you are told exactly what is happening and when.  Hold a small rubber ball or "stress ball" in your other hand that you can squeeze tightly and focus all your attention into squeezing. Take a deep breath and breath out when the needle goes in. It will not be as scary if you are focusing on other things. Think mind over matter! I know this helps me. Good luck and I say it`s ok to keep up with the happy hours! \
Posts.Title: I'm afraid of needles & need a masectomy! jacquibutterfly Momine

Posts.Content: Dani37 wrote: I`m 37 and was diagnosed with breast cancer on the 13th of December.  I am a single Mom and scared out of my mind. I was told to visit this site by my sister and have found relief in just the few minutes I`ve been scanning. Would love any good vibes from you and I`m here for you as well. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Young and Scared Dani37 AnnNYC

Posts.Content: Jan 5, 2008 03:54AM Dani37 wrote: Ann, THANK YOU for responding to me!  I have one daughter who is 19.  I have a ton of support from family and friends but this site makes me feel safe. I`m in PA. but your close enough as far as I`m concerned! Hoping we talk again soon. Right back at you with the HUGS!
